com.rvandoosselaer.blocks

Interface Shape

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cube, Pyramid, Slab, Stair, Wedge

    public interface Shape
    The interface describing the shape of a Block element. The add(Vec3i, Chunk, ChunkMesh) method is called for each block in the chunk when the mesh is constructed using the MeshGenerationStrategy.
